title: The Dark Harlem White Knight
description:
White Knight Shirt W/ Silk Bag

A clean, radiant counterpart to the Black Knight — featuring the new Swarovski® crystal 44 emblem handcrafted onto luxury heavyweight cotton. Light-reflective, sharp, and iconic to the Volume II identity.

Every White Knight tee arrives sealed in a premium silk bag — because presentation is power.

Details:

  • • Sizes: S–3XL
  • • Fabric: Heavyweight cotton
  • • Logo: Swarovski® crystal set 44 emblem
  • • Color: Arctic white
  • • Includes premium silk logo bag
  • • Volume II limited drop

title: The Dark Harlem Black Knight
description:
Black Knight Shirt W/ Silk Bag

A true Volume II upgrade — the Black Knight tee now features a full Swarovski® crystal 44 emblem, set by hand for a shimmering, armor-grade finish that hits under flash like Gotham headlights.

Cut from heavyweight luxury cotton for a clean, structured silhouette. Sealed in a custom silk logo bag for premium presentation.

Details:

  • • Sizes: S–3XL
  • • Fabric: Heavyweight cotton
  • • Logo: Hand-set Swarovski® crystal 44 emblem
  • • Color: Jet black
  • • Includes premium silk bag
  • • Volume II limited drop

title: The Dark Harlem Knight Black Hoodie
description:
Dark Knight Hoodie W/ Silk Bag

A masterpiece from Volume II.

Hand-set Swarovski® crystals surround the iconic 44 emblem, sparkling like lightning across Gotham rooftops. Heavyweight luxury fleece delivers power and presence with every wear.

Each hoodie arrives in a custom silk 44 logo bag — presentation is power.

Details:

  • • Sizes: S–3XL
  • • Materials: Heavyweight fleece
  • • Crystal Work: Genuine Swarovski® crystals
  • • Color: Black
  • • Volume II limited drop
  • • Includes: Custom silk 44 logo bag

title: The Dark Harlem Knight Flare Sweatpants
description:
Dark Knight Flare Sweatpants W/ Silk Bag

Precision tailoring meets Gotham energy.

These flare sweatpants stack perfectly over your sneakers, finished with genuine Swarovski® crystals that glisten like rain hitting concrete under neon lights.

Each pair arrives sealed inside a custom silk 44 logo bag — the official uniform of the Dark Harlem Knight.

Details:

  • • Sizes: S–3XL
  • • Materials: Heavyweight fleece
  • • Fit: Tailored flare with stacked leg
  • • Crystals: Swarovski® 44 crystal detailing
  • • Color: Black
  • • Includes: Custom silk 44 logo bag

title: Dark Harlem Dame Crop Hoodie
description:
Dame Crop Hoodie W/ Silk Bag

Bold. Regal. Untouchable.

Designed for the Dame of Gotham, this cropped silhouette blends luxury fleece with hand-set Swarovski® crystals that shimmer under streetlights and lightning flashes alike.

Every hoodie arrives sealed inside a custom silk 44 logo bag — elevation from the moment it’s unboxed.

Details:

  • • Sizes: XS–XL
  • • Materials: Heavyweight luxury fleece
  • • Crystals: Genuine Swarovski® crystal 44 detailing
  • • Fit: Cropped silhouette
  • • Volume II limited drop
  • • Includes: Custom silk 44 logo bag

title: The Dark Harlem Dame Flare Sweatpants
description:
Dame Flare Sweatpants

Official uniform of the Dark Harlem Dame.

Tailored flare sweatpants designed to stack and move, finished with Swarovski® crystal accents that catch every flash of light from hallway to rooftop.

Luxury fleece feel. Street-bred attitude.

Details:

  • • Sizes: S–3XL
  • • Fit: Tailored flare with stacked leg
  • • Materials: Heavyweight fleece with ribbed waistband
  • • Crystals: Swarovski® crystal detailing
  • • Color: Black
  • • Designed in Harlem. Gotham certified.

title: DHK Heavy Boxy Tshirt
description:
DHK Heavy Boxy Tshirt w/ silk bag

A heavyweight boxy cut in dark grey with a premium suede-touch finish—soft in hand, aggressive in silhouette. Designed to drop on the shoulders and sit wide across the chest for that Gotham-street uniform look.

Our DHK logo neatly hand placed with Swarvoski crystals

Details:

  • • Color: Dark grey
  • • Fit: Heavy / boxy
  • • Material: Heavy suede feel
  • • Logo: Hand-placed crystal DHK emblem
  • • Includes: Premium silk bag

title: DHK Sweater
description:
DHK Sweater w/ silk bag

Built for cold nights and city lights. The DHK Sweater is a clean black essential—structured, heavy, and made to sit sharp over denim or stacked sweats. Minimal from a distance, lethal up close.

Our DHK logo neatly hand placed with Swarvoski crystals

Details:

  • • Color: Black
  • • Fit: Classic / structured sweater fit
  • • Feel: Warm, heavyweight knit
  • • Logo: Hand-placed crystal DHK emblem
  • • Includes: Premium silk bag

title: DHK Joggers
description:
DHK Tight Ankle Sweatpants w/ silk bag

Clean black sweatpants with a locked-in ankle—built to show the sneaker, keep the leg sharp, and move like armor. Heavyweight feel, street-ready finish, and a premium presence that reads luxury even in low light.

Our DHK logo neatly hand placed with Swarvoski crystals

Details:

  • • Color: Black
  • • Fit: Tapered leg with tight ankle cuff
  • • Feel: Heavyweight fleece / premium comfort
  • • Logo: Hand-placed crystal DHK emblem
  • • Includes: Premium silk bag
